title: rna_multisample
description: Processing unimodal multi-sample RNA transcriptomics data.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

output.help_text: Type: `file`, multiple: `False`, required, default: `"$id.$key.output.h5mu"`, direction: `output`, example: `"output.h5mu"`.

highly_variable_features_var_output.description: In which .var slot to store a boolean array corresponding to the highly variable features.

highly_variable_features_obs_batch_key.description: If specified, highly-variable features are selected within each batch separately and merged

highly_variable_features_flavor.description: Choose the flavor for identifying highly variable features

highly_variable_features_n_top_features.description: Number of highly-variable features to keep

var_qc_metrics.description:
Keys to select a boolean (containing only True or False) column from .var.
For each cell, calculate the proportion of total values for genes which are labeled 'True', 
compared to the total sum of the values for all genes.

top_n_vars.description:
Number of top vars to be used to calculate cumulative proportions.
If not specified, proportions are not calculated

output_obs_num_nonzero_vars.description:
Name of column in .obs describing, for each observation, the number of stored values
(including explicit zeroes)

output_obs_total_counts_vars.description:
Name of the column for .obs describing, for each observation (row),
the sum of the stored values in the columns.

output_var_num_nonzero_obs.description:
Name of column describing, for each feature, the number of stored values
(including explicit zeroes)

output_var_total_counts_obs.description:
Name of the column in .var describing, for each feature (column),
the sum of the stored values in the rows.

output_var_obs_mean.description: Name of the column in .obs providing the mean of the values in each row.

rna scaling options.title: RNA Scaling options
rna scaling options.description:
Options for enabling scaling of the log-normalized data to unit variance and zero mean.
The scaled data will be output a different layer and representation with reduced dimensions
will be created and stored in addition to the non-scaled data.

enable_scaling.description: Enable scaling for the RNA modality.

scaling_output_layer.description: Output layer where the scaled log-normalized data will be stored.

scaling_max_value.description: Clip (truncate) data to this value after scaling

scaling_zero_center.description: If set, omit zero-centering variables, which allows to handle sparse input efficiently."

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.
